title: First Date
prompt: A cozy café date scene. A young woman sits across the table, calm demeanor with a slight ironic smile. Warm lighting, intimate setting. She speaks directly to the camera as if the viewer is her date.

nodes.title: Arrival / Greeting
nodes.script: She sits at the table, relaxed, with a slight smile. She looks up and says: 'Hey. Hi. Nice to finally meet you. How are you doing?'

options.condition: Player responds politely and naturally, showing basic social awareness and respect
Player is rude, dismissive, or disrespectful in tone or content

nodes.title: Small Talk Starter
nodes.script: They're seated, drinks not ordered yet. Casual atmosphere. She says: 'So… how was your day today?'

options.condition: Player engages in natural back-and-forth conversation, showing interest
Player says something weird, inappropriate, or disrespectful

nodes.title: Interests & Hobbies
nodes.script: She leans forward a bit, curious. She asks: 'What do you usually like to do when you have free time?'

options.condition: Player describes balanced, genuine interests without excessive bragging or name-dropping
Player shows borderline flexing — mentions expensive hobbies, achievements, or status but not aggressively
Player heavily flexes about money, status, possessions, or achievements in a boastful way

nodes.title: Curiosity Check
nodes.script: She reacts naturally to what he just said. She asks: 'And what about you, what do you enjoy the most about that?'

options.condition: Player asks questions back, shows genuine curiosity about her life and interests
Player is self-centered, only talks about themselves without showing interest in her

nodes.title: Flex Follow-Up
nodes.script: She has a slight smile, half-joking tone. She says: 'That sounds intense. Do you ever just… switch off and relax?'

options.condition: Player is self-aware about their flexing, laughs about it, shows humility
Player doubles down on flexing or gets defensive about their lifestyle

nodes.title: Lifestyle & Routine
nodes.script: Relaxed conversation flow, neutral tone. She asks: 'What does a typical week look like for you?'

options.condition: Player describes healthy or neutral habits and lifestyle
Player mentions alcohol-centered lifestyle but conversation can continue

nodes.title: The Drink Moment
nodes.script: A waiter approaches. She looks at the player, then at the menu. She says: 'I'm not sure what to get. You can choose for me.'

options.condition: Player chooses a non-alcoholic drink, or asks her preference first, or suggests something without alcohol
Player orders alcohol or suggests alcoholic drinks casually

nodes.title: Past Experiences
nodes.script: Drinks arrived. Slightly more personal tone. She asks: 'Have you had any meaningful relationships or experiences that shaped you?'

options.condition: Player gives a balanced, reflective answer showing emotional maturity and growth
Player shows slight bitterness about past but isn't toxic about it
Player blames ex-partners, shows victim mentality, or speaks with drama and resentment

nodes.title: Growth & Self-Awareness
nodes.script: She listens attentively, then gently pushes. She asks: 'And looking back at that, what do you think you learned about yourself?'

options.condition: Player shows accountability, self-reflection, and personal growth
Player avoids responsibility, deflects, or shows no self-awareness

nodes.title: Awkward Beat
nodes.script: Small silence. She smiles, slightly playful. She says: 'Okay… that got a little deep for a first date.'

options.condition: Player laughs it off or handles the awkward moment gracefully
Player gets defensive, passive-aggressive, or makes it more awkward

nodes.title: Music / Fun Moment
nodes.script: Mood shift. She smiles more openly and asks: 'Random question… are you into music at all?'

options.condition: Player engages positively with the topic, shows enthusiasm or interest in music

nodes.title: Singing Test
nodes.script: Same playful vibe, she's calm but curious. She says: 'So… could you sing something? Even just a few seconds.'

options.condition: Player attempts to sing, even badly, or makes a fun effort showing they don't take themselves too seriously
Player refuses playfully but keeps the energy up
Player refuses harshly, kills the vibe, or reacts negatively to the playful request

nodes.title: Final Chemistry Check
nodes.script: End-of-date energy. She gathers her things slowly. She says: 'I had a nice time tonight. How did you feel about it?'

options.condition: Player is calm, respectful, engaged, and genuine in their response
Player is pushy, intense, or makes the ending uncomfortable

nodes.title: Date Success
nodes.script: She stands up with a warm smile. She says: 'Alright. I think that was really nice. Let's do this again sometime.' She gives a genuine, happy look.

nodes.title: Lost — Disrespectful
nodes.script: Her expression shifts. She looks away briefly, then back with a polite but cold smile. She says: 'Alright. I think that's a good place to stop. It was nice meeting you.' She stands up and leaves.

nodes.title: Lost — Flexer Detected
nodes.script: She leans back, slight eye roll she tries to hide. She says: 'You know what, I just remembered I have something early tomorrow. It was nice meeting you though.' She grabs her bag.

nodes.title: Lost — Alcohol
nodes.script: Her smile fades slightly. She looks at the drink, then at him. She says: 'Actually, I think I'm going to head out. I hope you enjoy the rest of your evening.' She stands up politely but firmly.

nodes.title: Lost — Victim Mindset
nodes.script: She listens but her eyes glaze over. She says: 'I appreciate you sharing that. I think I need to get going though. Take care of yourself.' Distant but not cruel.

nodes.title: Lost — Killed the Vibe
nodes.script: The playful energy drops. She nods slowly. 'Okay, no worries.' Awkward silence. She checks her phone. 'I think I should probably head out soon.' The date is over.
